thread.title: Ghanaian striker Derek Asamoah scores for Carlisle in defeat in English lower tier
thread.title_full: Ghanaian striker Derek Asamoah scores for Carlisle in defeat in English lower tier

title: Ghanaian striker Derek Asamoah scores for Carlisle in defeat in English lower tier
text:
Sports News | 11 October 2015 19:40 CET Ghanaian striker Derek Asamoah scores for Carlisle in defeat in English lower tier - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Ghana striker Derek Asamoah scored for the home side but Shaun Miller's fine form continued as Morecambe came from behind to record a first Football League win over Carlisle on Saturday. 
The striker's two goals made it four in three games as The Shrimps got back to winning ways in League 2 with a first victory in five games. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
